architectural_elements.name: Wooden Beams
architectural_elements.description: Aged support beams, splintered and creaky, with cobwebs stretched across them.

architectural_elements.name: Slanted Roof
architectural_elements.description: Low, angled roof with exposed rafters and water stains from old leaks.

architectural_elements.name: Small Window
architectural_elements.description: A single grimy window that lets in a thin beam of moonlight, dust swirling in the glow.

architectural_elements.name: Trapdoor
architectural_elements.description: A wooden hatch with rusty hinges leading to the floors below, sometimes opening on its own.

architectural_elements.name: Wooden Floorboards
architectural_elements.description: Warped, uneven boards that creak loudly with every step.

furniture_and_decor.name: Old Rocking Chair
furniture_and_decor.description: A dusty wooden rocking chair that sways gently when no one is near.

furniture_and_decor.name: Antique Trunk
furniture_and_decor.description: A large, weathered trunk with rusty metal clasps and faint initials carved into the lid.

furniture_and_decor.name: Dusty Table
furniture_and_decor.description: A small table covered in thick dust, with old candle wax and scraps of fabric.

furniture_and_decor.name: Wardrobe
furniture_and_decor.description: A tall, forgotten wardrobe with cracked doors and tattered clothes hanging inside.

furniture_and_decor.name: Broken Mirror
furniture_and_decor.description: A shattered mirror leaning against the wall, reflecting distorted shapes.

atmospheric_details.name: Cobwebs
atmospheric_details.description: Dense cobwebs filling every corner, glinting faintly in the dim light.

atmospheric_details.name: Dust Particles
atmospheric_details.description: Floating dust visible in the air, disturbed by the player’s movement.

atmospheric_details.name: Flickering Light Bulb
atmospheric_details.description: A single dim bulb that flickers erratically, casting twitching shadows.

atmospheric_details.name: Cold Spots
atmospheric_details.description: Chilling patches of air that make the player’s breath visible.

atmospheric_details.name: Faint Footsteps
atmospheric_details.description: Soft creaks as if someone else is walking in the attic.

interactive_objects.name: Photo Album
interactive_objects.description: A dusty book filled with faded family photos, some faces scratched out.

interactive_objects.name: Toy Chest
interactive_objects.description: An old wooden box containing broken toys and a music box that still plays.

interactive_objects.name: Mannequin
interactive_objects.description: A headless mannequin draped with a torn dress, facing the corner.

interactive_objects.name: Portrait Painting
interactive_objects.description: A cracked painting of a family member with eyes that seem to follow the player.

interactive_objects.name: Metal Chest
interactive_objects.description: A locked chest with a faint knocking sound coming from inside.

environmental_effects.name: Floating Dust
environmental_effects.description: Dust motes drifting in beams of light, creating a thick, musty atmosphere.

environmental_effects.name: Rats
environmental_effects.description: Small rats scurrying between boxes and crates when the player gets close.

environmental_effects.name: Creaking Sounds
environmental_effects.description: Boards and beams groaning softly, responding to unseen weight.

environmental_effects.name: Ambient Fog
environmental_effects.description: A low mist clinging to the floor, swirling around the player’s feet.

lighting.name: Moonlight
lighting.description: Dim silver light streaming through the window, illuminating motes of dust.

lighting.name: Flickering Bulb
lighting.description: A bare bulb swinging slightly, casting moving shadows across the attic.

lighting.name: Candlelight
lighting.description: A single candle left on a table, nearly burned out, melting into a pool of wax.
